description: Gets information about an on-premises instance.

parameters.name: instanceName
parameters.description: The name of the on-premises instance about which to get information.

nested_items.name: instanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the on-premises instance.

nested_items.name: iamSessionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM session associated with the on-premises instance.

nested_items.name: iamUserArn
nested_items.description: The user ARN associated with the on-premises instance.

nested_items.name: instanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the on-premises instance.

nested_items.name: registerTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the on-premises instance was registered.

nested_items.name: deregisterTime
nested_items.description: If the on-premises instance was deregistered, the time at which the on-premises instance was deregistered.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tags currently associated with the on-premises instance.
